main event: On May 7, 1952, a disc-shaped object was reportedly photographed over Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, by representatives of 'O Cruzeiro' magazine.
interesting points: The object made a 135-degree turn and disappeared toward the northeast at high speed., The photographs of the object were reportedly priced at $25,000., Witnesses included numerous Brazilian citizens and members of the military., The evaluation of the incident indicated insufficient details for thorough investigation., There are claims that military units were engaged in exercises during the sightings, adding to the credibility.
